attributes.action: Leave europe and cut immingration and welfare costs
attributes.additional_details:
I have set up this petition to get the government to help britian become great britian.

We the people of britian want us to leave Europe or alter a deal which will be fair. We are currently having to cut back but we still give money to Europe. We the public want the cash spent in helping our country to pay for hospitals, schools.

We want out of Europe so that we can say money and provide jobs for people in britian who need a job. We also want immigration cut and changes to the welfare which could included no benefits till you have paid atlesst 5,000 pounds in tax, no benefits going to some other country and no right to housing unless you been in the UK for five years and been registered no walk in and get it policy.

We also want the nhs to give out heath cards where it will help stop heath tourism ic your not British you will have to pay in advance and won't be allowed any free treatment
